entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 2:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
